title: Slope of a tangent line to a logarithmic curve

content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>ln</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4064@</annotation> </semantics> </math> at the point where <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGinaaaa@3BBC@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?
